page.title: 16CHURCHES IN SPALDWICK
page.content: There are three places of worship in Spaldwick.The parish church which is Church of England,Baptist Church and meeting house for Christian Brethren. On the site of the present meeting house,there has been a place of worship at Spaldwick for over one hundred years.The original building was an old school room and the meetings were started by a school master under the guidance of a Christian man,Mr.J.N.Darby from Ireland(where he was a minister of the Church of England but gave up this living to be more devoted to God).There is no minister and today about one dozen people from the surrounding area gather together to attend various meetings.There is no altar,pulpit or organ in the building and no artistic decoration.
